name: Duck & Weave
description:
Duck & Weave was developed by a 2 man team for the Untitled Game Jam #37. 

You Play as a Duck who has just escaped the chopping block! In order to survive you must find and press a switch to summon the DumbWaiter. When the DumbWaiter arrives, you have limited time to get inside, and escape. but beware of the evil Chef!! he will not let you get away to easily!

Duck & Weave includes 3 Kitchen maps, with randomized button spawns to mix up each round.

Credits to Synty Studio for the use of their Polygon asset pack (kitchen/office environment assets).

Kevin Macleod for Royalty Free BGM
